name: 150,000 B.C.
description: This is a game set in prehistoric age. There is an amazing primitive world, in which you will have to survive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual core Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 20 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 100 MB available space
